definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 38:14 entrance, a coming in, entering;—´[[מ]] abs. Je 38:14 + 3 t. + Ez Eze 42:9 Kt (Qr [[מֵבִיא]] wrong, cf. Co); cstr. [[מְבוֹא]] De 11:30 + 12 t.; sf. [[מְבוֹאוֹ]] Ps 104:19 + 2 t.; [[מְבׂאוֹ]] Ps 50:1; [[מבואך]] 2Sa 3:25 Kt (Qr [[מוֹבָאֶָךָ]] inexplicable cf. Dr); pl. cstr. [[מְבוֹאֵי]] Ez Eze 26:10, [[מְבוֹאׂת]] Ez Eze 27:3; —

entrance, i.e. place or way of entrance, into a city Ju Jdg 1:24, Jdg 1:25, 1Ch 4:39, Pr 8:3 ([[פְּתָחִים]] ´[[מ]]); into buildings 2Ki 11:16, 2Ki 16:18, 1Ch 9:19 ([[שׁׂמְרֵי]] [[הַמָּבוֹא]]), 2Ch 23:13, 2Ch 23:15, Je 38:14, Ez Eze 42:9, Eze 46:19; v. also [[מְבוֹאׂת יׇם]] entrance of (the) sea, gate of the sea, of situation of Tyre Ez Eze 27:3.

entering, act of entrance, by violence, in storm of city Ez Eze 26:10; coming in or together, making a crowd, [[כִּמְבוֹא עָָם]] Ez Eze 33:31 sim. of eagerness to hear Yahweh's word; in phrase [[אֶת־מוֹחָאֲךָ וְאֶת־מבואך]] 2Sa 3:25 thy going out and thy coming in, mode of entering temple, or the people who enter Ez Eze 44:5; particularly of sunset [[מְכוֹא הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ]] Ps 104:19; = west De 11:30; Jos 1:4, Jos 23:4 [[הַיׇּם הַגׇּרוֹל מְבוֹא]] [[הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ]] = Mediterranean, Zec 8:7 [[אֶרֶץ מְבוֹא הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ]] (‖[[אֶרֶץ מִזְרָח]]), Mal 1:11, Ps 50:1, Ps 113:3 sunset = west, opp. sunrise = east; in phr. from E. to W., i.e. over the whole earth, everywhere on earth.
